content.raw: It is stated that you can submit the same artifact as many times as you like without penalty as it counts as one submission as long as the submitted location is exactly the same.  I am not exactly aware of the maximum number of times you can submit unique artifact locations so I’ll start investigating.  I am aware there is a limit as I have encountered it during testing.
